name: Orfea's Flappy EX Guy Game
description:
Welcome To Another Flappy Bird Game! This Is Absolutely A Clone Of Flappy Bird. It's Just A Normal Clone, Like Everyone's Else. No Need To See More, Just A Flappy Bird Game!

OH HELL NO!

OrfeasWorldGames Studio Are Returning To Their Old Roots With OFEGG / Orfea's Flappy EX Guy Game! The Game Is A Flappy Bird (duh) But Now Instead Of A Bird You Are The EX Guy (probably). Try Avoiding The Columns & The EX Drones, Or You Are Dead!

And...Oh My Oh My This Is Not Just A Flappy Bird Clone! This Is OFEGG! A Different Clone That Will ChangeThe NEW Flappy Bird Clones In History!

___ABOUT OFEGG___

OFEGG Is Not A Common Flappy Bird Game Is Just WAY TOO Different But.. It's Based On The Most Known Game The 'Flappy Bird'!  We Also Made A Previous Version And Original Game Called 'OFBG' Which You Can Visit Its Page HERE

___CONTROLS___

You Can Play With Only One Click! 

LMB To Fly-Jump / Left Mouse Button (duh)

___SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS___

________MINIMUM________

•OS: WINDOWS 7/8/10

•PROCESSOR : INTEL CORE i3 8100

•GRAPHICS CARD: GeForce GTS 450 1GB LP- Radeon R5 230 1GB

•RAM: 3GB RAM

•DirectX: VERSION 11

•STORAGE: LESS THAN 300 MB AVAILABLE SPACE

________RECOMMENDED________

•OS: WINDOWS 7/8/10

•PROCESSOR: INTEL CORE i3 8350k

•GRAPHICS CARD: GeForce GTX 750ti 2GB-R9 270X 2GB

•RAM: 4GB RAM 

 •DirectX: VERSION 11

_____SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS FOR MAC_____

•PROCCESOR: INTEL (64-bit)  CORE I5-6500 OR BETTER (it might run on intel core duo but with not a good experience)

•RAM: 2GB RAM OR MORE

•STORAGE: LESS THAN 300MB AVAILABLE SPACE

•DISPLAY: ANY

_____SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS FOR LINUX_____

  • 3 GHz Dual PROCESSOR 
  • 4 GB RAM
  • GTX 1050 2GB/ RADEON RX  550 2GB
  • 1090 x 1080 RESOLUTION (or any)
  • LESS THAN 300 MB STORAGE SPACE

The Developers Describe The Content Like This:

This Game contains content which is appropriate for all ages!

Rated For Everyone!
